column5: thoughts and prayers on this terrible news
Simon , our sincerest condolences go out to you and your family. Vince, Samantha and Emily
Condolances Simon, from my family to yours.
tragic news !! my sincere condolences simon,sorry to hear that
Tragic indeed!  My condolences to you and your family Simon.
Very sad news, our condolences to you and your family Simon.
That's horrible news.  Very sad in-deed.  My thoughts are with you during this tough time.
Our condolences to you and your family Simon. We're very sorry to hear this news.  Michelle and Rob
sorry for your loss my condolences to you and your family
In our thoughts.
horrible news Thoughts are with you and yours
So sorry for your loss... HH
So sorry for your loss Simon, your family is in our prayers...   Sandro
Simon, I'm so sorry to hear of this. Suzanna is heart broken for you. Our condolences.
So sorry to hear about this Simon and family!
thoughts and prayers are with you and your family .
Simon, I'm sorry to hear of this. My condolences and prayers to you and your family. Chris
Very tragic. Deepest sympathies for your family.
Simon, Cindy and I are both sad to hear the passing of your mom....Our thoughts and prayers are with you, your family and mom.  Bob
So sorry to hear this Simon!!  Sincere condolences, bud.
saw this news yesterday as well and I'm truly sorry and saddened by your loss. My sincerest condolences to you and your family.
Deepest sympathies to you and your family Simon.

Hi All, On behalf of our family,sincerest thanks for your kind words, prayers, sympathies and condolences. Yesterday was tragic and surreal. Today, things are coming together. Mom's legacy is strong and will live on. God bless you all.  Simon & Family.
Deepest sympathies to Simon and his family.
So sorry to hear this Simon. Your family will be in our thoughts and Prayers.
I'm so sorry Simon!  Pam
My sincere condolences Simon.

I just got word that our friend Simon's (pikeslayer) mom died today after being hit by a bus in Mississauga.  We only had the pleasure of meeting Mary a few weeks ago when we got to spend a weekend with the family at a cottage up at Maple Lake. She was a beautiful lady, full of life and energy, she will be missed by many.  Our heart and prayers go out to the family. RIP Mary.
thoughts and prayers
My sincerest condolences goes out to Simon's family and friends.
Dang I am very sorry to here of this tragic news our thoughts are defiantly with him and his family.
condolences to the family sorry to hear
Horrible to hear something like this.  Simon - our thoughts and prayers are with ya bud.
I heard about this on the news and as I read this post my heart sank.  My deepest condolences...
Simon, my deepest condolences.
So sorry...a very tragic loss.
Very sorry to hear of this news

Terrible news. I heard the report on 680News today, but you never think that something like that will have even a remote connection to you. We are a lot closer together than we think. Condolences to Simon and his family.
Sorry to hear about your mother Simon, my sincere condolences to you and your family. May her soul rest in peace.
I'm with you CCMT, It 's tragic news for all.
So sorry Simon, Thoughts and prayers for you guys
Very sorry to hear Condolences

As little condolence as it might be to you Simon and Junior, mine and J's thoughts are with you and yours this day. I can't believe how difficult this must be for you right now. I just don't know what else to tell you...there simply are no words. God Bless.
So sad, Sincerest condolences
That is just horrific news.  A life cut short like that is such a tragedy.  Condolances to you and your family Simon.  Very sorry for your loss.  Joey and Paul
I can't believe it .....Simon, Sincere condolences from Barb and I.I feel like the wind has been knocked out of me. God Bless you and your familly.
Maribeth and I send our deepest sympathy to you and yours Simon...
Stay strong friend , Ron & Beverly .
Very sad. Sorry for your family loss Simon.
Very sad news indeed. My deepest condolences to you and your family Simon.
I'm very sorry to hear that, thanks for letting us know Cliff, Simon, our thoughts are with you and your family..  Maureen
